message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1500000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this unique item for $1200000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true value and my objective to ensure a profitable transaction. I am confident that this offer will be beneficial for both parties and look forward to your positive response.
